akn:section.akn:heading: Repealed. Pub. L. 97–35, title VI, § 683(a), Aug. 13, 1981, 95 Stat. 519

akn:content.akn:p:
§§ 2790, 2791. Repealed. Pub. L. 97–35, title VI, § 683(a), Aug. 13, 1981, 95 Stat. 519
Section 2790, Pub. L. 88–452, title II, § 210, Aug. 20, 1964, 78 Stat. 519; Pub. L. 90–222, title I, § 104, Dec. 23, 1967, 81 Stat. 691; Pub. L. 93–644, §§ 5(a), (b), 9(a), Jan. 4, 1975, 88 Stat. 2294, 2310; Pub. L. 94–341, § 2(a)(7), July 6, 1976, 90 Stat. 803; Pub. L. 95–568, §§ 4(a), (b), 17(a)(3), Nov. 2, 1978, 92 Stat. 2425, 2439, related to designation of community action agencies.
Section 2791, Pub. L. 88–452, title II, § 211, Aug. 20, 1964, 78 Stat. 520; Pub. L. 90–222, title I, § 104, Dec. 23, 1967, 81 Stat. 693; Pub. L. 92–424, §§ 6, 7, Sept. 19, 1972, 86 Stat. 690; Pub. L. 95–568, §§ 4(c), 17(a)(4), Nov. 2, 1978, 92 Stat. 2425, 2439, related to community action agencies and boards.
Statutory Notes and Related Subsidiaries Effective Date of RepealRepeal effective Oct. 1, 1981, see section 9912(a) of this title, prior to the general amendment of chapter 106 (§ 9901 et seq.) of this title by Pub. L. 105–285.
